It is a genuine pleasure and honor for me to recommend Julianne Anderson.  Julianne worked for me in the Technologies Support Department at CCI supporting IBM/Ameriprise for 2 summers. She was dedicated to her work and the job at hand.Julianne demonstrated from early in her tenure that she understood what Customer Service is all about. She was well organized and very friendly. In closing, let me say I have no hesitation in recommending Julianne for any position pertaining to information technology or Customer Service.  I feel confident she would be an asset to your organization as she was to mine.
